sentences.cn: 像列奥纳多这样的智慧巨人

sentences.en: An intense battle starts between Kratos and Colossus among buildings of City of Rhodes.
sentences.cn: 奎托斯和巨像激烈的战斗由此展开,罗德斯城林立的建筑之间就是他们的战场!

sentences.en: Colossus would be the unit you are looking for.
sentences.cn: 巨像将是你想要找的单位.

sentences.en: He became a colossus of the labour movement.
sentences.cn: 他成为了劳工运动中举足轻重的人物。

sentences.en: Historically, it was known for its Colossus of Rhodes.
sentences.cn: 罗德港在历史上以巨人雕像而闻名于世.

sentences.en: Max [ looking over at colossus canid in desert ] Whats that?
sentences.cn: 麦克斯:(仔细看着一条巨狗 ) 那是什么?

sentences.en: Mozart is a colossus among composers.
sentences.cn: 莫札特是作曲家中的巨匠.

sentences.en: The boxer weighs three hundred pounds and walks like a veritable colossus.
sentences.cn: 这个拳击手重三百镑,走起路来像个十足的巨人.

sentences.en: The Colossus always attacks in a linear area horizontal to where the Colossus is facing.
sentences.cn: 巨像会攻击它面前的直线范围内的单位.

sentences.en: The Colossus category is for information and future usage.
sentences.cn: 对于巨型船只的具体说明我们会在以后放出.

sentences.en: The Colossus is using our new IK system to setp up and down this cliff.
sentences.cn: “巨神像”使用了我们最新的“IK系统”能够自如地上下峭壁.

sentences.en: The Colossus of Rhodes was a huge statue constructed in Rhodes in the 3 rd century BC.
sentences.cn: 罗德港巨人雕像是一座巨大的雕像,建于公元前3世纪的罗德港,几乎与纽约的自由女神像一样大.

sentences.en: The colossus that bestrode the world!
sentences.cn: 哦,这个雄踞全世界的巨人!

sentences.en: The colossus would soar higher into the sky.
This makes the colossus the ideal support unit for this group of Zealots.
sentences.cn: 这样“巨神像”成为“狂热者”部队理想的支援后盾.

sentences.en: Week of Colossus: Double growth for Colossuses and Titans.
sentences.cn: 巨人周: 巨人与泰坦产量加倍.

trans.tran_en: someone or something that is extremely big or extremely important
